title: Why MVC is so important
post_content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
post_content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own idendtity, whereas authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
post_content: I have really loved ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!
